(26515, 29533).description: The outermost solid layer of the planet, encompassing land, oceans, and atmosphere

(28926, 32132).name: Southern Ocean
(28926, 32132).label: location

(28926, 32132).description: The sea ice surrounding Antarctica, which has been expanding despite global warming trends

(28926, 32132).name: atmospheric greenhouse gas concentrations

(28926, 32132).name: climate models

(28926, 32132).description: Sophisticated computer simulations used to represent and predict Earth's climate system, including the response to anthropogenic forcing and internal variability

(28926, 32132).name: atmospheric teleconnections

(28926, 32132).name: aerosols

(31603, 33860).name: climate models
